name: SAP SuccessFactors
descr: At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution.  Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined.  We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises.  Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business.  The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more.  We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries.  Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities.  We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.

name: S4 HANA Cloud
descr: S/4HANA Cloud Foundation is at the center of S/4HANA Cloud Development, accelerating Innovation Delivery. We are the link between efficient cloud application development and ease of consumption for our customers. This includes development of Scenarios such as Hire-To-Retire, Cloud Enablement features, Driving Cloud Development Principles, Driving internal adoption of Cross Application Services and Features, Development of Extensibility, Integration, Analytics, Data Management, etc.

name: SAP Procurement
descr: As SAP Procurement Product Team, we strive to provide the world’s leading cloud-based spend management solution, unifying the SAP procurement portfolio across SAP S/4HANA, SAP Ariba Apps & Network, and SAP Fieldglass.

name: SAP Enterprise Cloud Services
descr: The mission of the ECS Delivery organization within the Enterprise Cloud Services (ECS) Unit is to build and operate the HANA Enterprise Cloud Portfolio. This is an enabling function to help customers to gain advantage out of HANA without the necessity to invest in infrastructure and operations know-how. The power of HANA shall be easy and cloudlike to be consumed to accelerate and enable HANA adoption in the market. Besides day to day administration we are driving/part of strategic pilot projects for new technologies as reference for SAP customers
